backend/main.mo: Main actor for the Quick Bee Agency backend, defining all core data types (User, Service, Project, Lead, Order, CRM, etc.) and including mixins for authorization, blob storage, and Stripe/payment integrations with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms the old actor state to the new actor state by preserving existing maps and initializing a new empty `salesSystemConfigs` map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs to their associated source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON document summarizing the purpose of each frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including background, foreground, sidebar, and chart color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Quick Bee Agency React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all application routes, React Query provider, theme provider, and a profile setup dialog for newly authenticated users.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentials.ts: Defines hardcoded demo credentials for Admin, Manager, and Client roles and exports a validation function to match email/password pairs to a role.
frontend/src/auth/useSession.ts: React hook that persists and retrieves the current demo user session (email and role) in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/cart/useCart.ts: React hook managing a shopping cart with localStorage persistence, supporting add, remove, update quantity, clear, and total price calculation.
frontend/src/components/automation/Sales: A dialog component for configuring a sales system's API endpoint and key, with test connection functionality and save/load via backend queries.
frontend/src/components/bootstrap/Bootst: Displays an error panel for bootstrap failures, supporting both login-context inline alerts and full-page error views with retry functionality.
A gate component that conditionally renders children, a loading spinner, or an error/timeout screen based on bootstrap state and a watchdog timer.
Provides the main application layout shell with a sidebar, top navigation, and a scrollable main content area over a background mesh image.
frontend/src/components/layout/SidebarNa: Renders the sidebar navigation with role-based visible nav items, grouped AI Sales Tools section, and a logout handler.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar with a search input, notification bell with unread count, and a dropdown showing recent notifications with mark-as-read and routing support.
frontend/src/components/leads/BulkAction: A toolbar component displayed when leads are selected, offering bulk export, delete, status change, and clear selection actions.
frontend/src/components/leads/BulkStatus: A dialog for bulk-updating the status of multiple selected leads, iterating through each and reporting success/failure counts via toasts.
frontend/src/components/leads/EditPaymen: Dialog component for editing a payment link's custom URL and QR code, supporting QR generation via an external API or file upload, with save mutations for URL and QR code updates.
frontend/src/components/leads/PaymentLin: Dialog component that displays a generated payment link with copy, open, and QR download actions, and provides access to the EditPaymentLinkDialog for modifications.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Dialog form for creating a new service with fields for name, description, category, three pricing tiers with features, general features, and visibility/settings, submitting via the createService mutation.
Confirmation dialog for deleting a service by name, invoking the deleteService mutation and calling an onSuccess callback upon completion.
Dialog form for editing an existing service's details, pricing tiers, features, and settings, pre-populated from the service prop and submitted via the updateService mutation.
Dialog for editing a service's payment link URL and QR code, supporting QR generation via an external API or image file upload, saved via the updateServicePaymentInfo mutation.
Displays a service's payment information card showing a copyable payment link URL and/or a downloadable QR code image. Returns null if neither value is provided.
A dialog component for configuring Razorpay payment settings (enable/disable, key ID, order ID) for a specific service, using the useUpdateServiceRazorpay mutation to persist changes.
frontend/src/components/settings/Razorpa: A settings panel card for entering and saving global Razorpay API credentials (key, secret, webhook secret), with a toggle to show/hide secrets and a status indicator for whether Razorpay is configured.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing access control with an admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
A hook that sets a 5-second timeout flag to detect bootstrap/loading stalls, with a reset function to restart the timer.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks (queries and mutations) for interacting with the ICP backend actor, covering entities such as services, leads, orders, projects, payments, and user profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Inter and Space Grotesk fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines a dark-themed design system using OKLCH color variables for backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar, plus utility classes for gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with TanStack QueryClientProvider and a custom InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/marketplace/servicesCatalog: Exports a static array of 30 default marketplace services, each with a name and description, covering digital services like web development, SEO, AI tools, and e-commerce.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Analytics dashboard page that fetches orders, leads, services, and projects to display KPI cards and Recharts-based area, bar, and pie charts for revenue trends and lead status distribution.
frontend/src/pages/AutomationPage.tsx: Automation settings page that allows users to toggle integration automations (WhatsApp, proposals, payments, onboarding) and configure AI sales systems, persisting settings via backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page that lists cart items with quantity controls and removal, shows an order summary with 18% GST calculation, and links to checkout or back to services if the cart is empty.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page that displays cart order summary with GST calculation and supports Stripe and conditionally Razorpay payment methods, auto-selecting based on configuration and cart service eligibility.
Placeholder page for client project onboarding that renders a card with a message indicating the onboarding form will appear after project creation.
frontend/src/pages/CRMPage.tsx: CRM pipeline page that displays CRM activities grouped by sales stage (New Lead through Lost) in a kanban-style card grid, with lead names resolved from the leads list.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying KPI cards (revenue, active projects, orders, conversion rate) and quick-action navigation buttons derived from live backend data.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratorsPage.tsx: Static page listing six rule-based business generator tools (proposals, pricing, scripts, etc.) as clickable cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Full-featured leads management page with search/filter, create/update/delete operations, bulk actions, status changes, and a payment link dialog per lead.
frontend/src/pages/LegalPage.tsx: Displays a grid of six required legal document cards (Privacy Policy, Terms, etc.), showing content from the backend or a placeholder if not yet created.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page supporting demo credential login and Internet Identity authentication, with a post-login profile setup flow and feature highlights sidebar.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Notifications page with tabbed unread/read views, click-to-navigate behavior based on notification type, and a mark-as-read action per notification.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure screen with an error icon and buttons to navigate back to the cart or dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Admin payments page showing revenue stats, a tabbed view of all orders and payment links, with status badges and the ability to update payment link statuses.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays a payment success screen, clears the cart on mount, and provides links to view projects or go to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PricingStrategyPage.t: Interactive pricing calculator that applies urgency and complexity multipliers to a base price and displays a detailed cost breakdown.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a single project (ID, status, service, start date) fetched by project ID from the route params.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Lists all projects belonging to the authenticated user in a card grid, resolving service names and showing status badges with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalGeneratorPage: AI-powered proposal generator page with a form for client/business details and selected services, rendering a formatted proposal preview with sections for summary, scope, services, and investment.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed view of a single service including pricing tiers (Basic/Pro/Premium), add-to-cart functionality, and admin controls for editing, deleting, and managing payment info/Razorpay settings.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceRecommendation: A form-driven page where users input business type, budget, and goals to receive AI-generated service recommendations displayed as scored, tiered cards.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists all available services in a searchable grid with admin controls for creating, editing, and deleting services.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Admin-only settings page that renders the Razorpay payment gateway configuration panel, with access control based on caller admin status.
frontend/src/payments/useCreateCheckoutS: A React Query mutation hook that calls the backend actor to create a Stripe checkout session and returns the session URL for redirect.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a dark-themed design system with custom brand (teal/green), dark background color palettes, typography, border radii, and box shadow tokens.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state (version 3) for an AI-powered sales platform with teal-green + black theme, listing existing features, architectural notes, and known issues.
